ygData.subject: Re: Weaknesses to invisibility song
ygData.msgSnippet: was put on test server last week, hopefully regular servers soon.  not sure how it is used yet, but you will be able to automatically follow another player.
ygData.messageBody:
was put on test server last week, hopefully regular servers soon. not sure
how it is used yet, but you will be able to automatically follow another
player.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 41 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


-----Original Message-----
From: Mike Roach [mailto:mroach@...]
Sent: Monday, June 07, 1999 10:37 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Weaknesses to invisibility song


From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>

I think I missed something in the thread, what is the "/follow" command I
have seen a few people mention?

-Faras of Qeynos

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
> [mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
> Sent: Monday, June 07, 1999 11:33 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Weaknesses to invisibility song
>
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> when they implement the /follow command invis will be a LOT
> more useful
> song.
>
> Shada Silverleaf, Level 41 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
